title: Who belongs in a museum?
body:
[](http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/152/600/fc6.jpg)
{{champion:81}} You belong in a museum.
######{{champion:26}} ...let it go, Zilean. Butterfly effect...
{{champion:11}} That was rude.
{{champion:81}} You and your ideals belong in a museum.
{{champion:30}} Ugh. Your damp sense of humor is _dampening_ my spirits.
{{champion:81}} You of all people belong in a museum.
{{champion:30}} Foolish mortal. I shall end you-
{{champion:82}} How dare you insult the lead singer of our band! I will enjoy twisting every facet of your soul-
{{champion:81}} Wow, that is a _very_ nice suit of armor.
{{champion:82}} Really? Thanks, my necromages made it for m-
{{champion:81}} It would make a very good display in a museum, with you included.
{{champion:82}} ...
{{champion:245}} Hey guys. How's it- SHUT UP, EZREAL.
{{champion:81}} O-O
{{champion:245}} It took me 6 tried to nail that. Anyway, I- no, none of that, Ez.
{{champion:81}} But I didn't-
{{champion:245}} None. Of. That.
{{champion:81}} :(
{{champion:245}} Anyway, I've been working on a way to extend the duration I can go back in time: one part on my person so I can restart whenever I want. Isn't time travel awes-
{{champion:81}} You belong in a museum. Haha haha haa!
{{champion:245}} God f*cking damn it, I'm outta juice.
{{champion:41}} What are ye silphsnipes talkin' about?
{{champion:81}} Perfect! A display for the pirates of Bilgewater.
{{champion:41}} Um... thanks?
{{champion:238}} ...damn birds...
{{champion:81}} The ninjas of Ionia, exhibit 1!
{{champion:238}} _Shakes head and keeps walking_
{{champion:112}} What? Why have I been teleported here?
{{champion:81}} Ancient Zaun technology, exhibit A!
{{champion:112}} Fool, this is the most cutting edge tech in all of Runeter-
{{champion:3}} Hello, I'm here to make some people less relevant.
{{champion:81}} Um... maybe they should make a museum OUT of you.
{{champion:3}} A museum! I'm honored! ...what's a museum again?
{{champion:80}} Some oversized giant stepped on my bakery!
{{champion:81}} Those relic-weapons. How priceless. That belongs in a MUSEUM!
{{champion:80}} Who's this weirdo?
{{champion:14}} Not sure.
{{champion:81}} Is that the crown of Jarvan 2? Hand it over, I'll put it in a museum right away!
{{champion:14}} What? No, I earned this, screw you.
{{champion:44}} Where would I be in a museum, pretty boy? Gems? Handsome Targonians?
{{champion:81}} Eh... I don't really see you being in a museum. Bye.
{{champion:44}} _Clutches heart_
{{champion:72}} Tough luck, pal.
{{champion:44}} _Sobbing_ Why can't he see me for who I am?!?
{{champion:164}} Hello, Ezreal.
{{champion:81}} Whaddya want? I'm busy.
{{champion:164}} Well, I just came to show you real cutting edge technology.
{{champion:81}} Please. Your design is almost a century old.
{{champion:164}} Oh, no, not me. He has it.
Br{{champion:2}} It's a beer hat.
{{champion:81}} This... this is incredible, I've never seen anything like it!
Br{{champion:2}} Whoa, dude, you never heard of a beer hat? Old news, dude. What, you belong in a museum or something?
######{{champion:81}} Museun... I belong in... a... belong... me... museum...
{{champion:164}} ...Ezreal?
{{champion:81}} _Eyes widen, pupils narrow_ I have some thinking to do.

##_And from that moment on, Ezreal lived his entire life in an existential crisis._

replies.body:
None of the responses are: "You Must Construct Additional Pylons!"

http://i.ytimg.com/vi/l3HMALfodb8/hqdefault.jpg
We have enough pylons. Now take gramps home before he starts ranting about the days he beat Faker in mid lane.
The fact that my brother plays a ton of Ezreal and always goes on how we all belong in a Museum makes this ten times funnier.
Your new icon is unfitting. Inject it with Iron.

> {{champion:81}} You belong in a museum.
> ######{{champion:26}} ...let it go, Zilean. Butterfly effect...

The sand glows yellow in Shurima tonight,
not a footprint... to be seen.
A desert of isolation.
And it looks like.
I'm the queen.

The time is howling like a swirling storm inside.
Couldn't keep E in, my player knows I've tried.
Is this to the tune of Over the Misty Mountains Cold?
Let it go...

Oh, haha. 

I forgot that shit existed.
Actually it's Jarvan 1's Crown on SIon's Jaw
Ezreal will never admit his mistakes.
This does: https://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/hearthstone.gamepedia.com/thumb/8/8c/Doomhammer%28172%29_Gold.png/200px-Doomhammer%28172%29_Gold.png?version=4a9e9095f47d27348ec8bea5f82cb738
This post belongs in a museum... so we can treasure it forever.
Ezreal realizes his true place. Being a museum janitor.

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/246/885/bdf.jpg
You belong in a museum with me and the other old memes.
what's this meme called *from the thumbnail* ?
Pretty sure it's a "handsome Ezreal" meme, much like the squidward one. Either that or "manly."
Who needs a map to get to the museum they belong in?

these are so fucking cringe 

still a scuff tho
MAH BOI, DINNAR IS WAT ALL TRUE WARIORS STRIVE 4
[Is it beef?  Is beef for dinner?](https://youtu.be/tviyAIS9c_U?t=25s)
